name: Weathering App
description: A sleek and responsive weather app built with React.js, providing real-time weather updates with an intuitive user interface and dynamic animations.

name: Note App
description: A minimalist note-taking app offering a seamless user experience for capturing and organizing your thoughts effortlessly.

name: Typing Speed Game
description: Experience the thrill of speed typing in this engaging racing game challenging users to improve their typing skills against the clock.

name: Calculator
description: A user-friendly calculator app designed for efficiency and ease of use, enabling quick and accurate mathematical calculations with a sleek interface.

name: Rock Paper Scissors Game
description: Dive into the classic game of strategy and luck with this engaging app, featuring a user-friendly interface and animated gameplay for the ultimate rock-paper-scissors experience.

name: Wordle
description: Sharpen your word-guessing skills and unravel the mystery word with this addictive and visually appealing game app, combining strategy and vocabulary in a thrilling challenge.

name: Discord Clone Website
description: Showcasing my HTML and CSS proficiency, this website replicates the essence of Discord, providing an aesthetically pleasing and fully functional user interface for seamless text and voice communication.

name: Music App
description: Crafted with Python on Replit, this music app allows the user to view, add, update and delete songs in a database.

name: FilmFlix
description: Crafted with Python on Replit, this film app allows the user to view, add, update and delete films in a database.
